# Renal and Metabolic Sources

## Licensing Note
All formulas in this skill are derived from published research or standard medical references and are freely implementable with proper citation. This project uses original descriptions and does not copy proprietary content.

## CKD-EPI 2021 (Creatinine)
- Inker LA, et al. NEJM 2021;385:1737-1749. (CKD-EPI 2021 update)
- National Kidney Foundation: CKD-EPI 2021 equation documentation and coefficients.
- NIDDK: eGFR equations and calculator documentation.

## CKD-EPI 2021 (Creatinine + Cystatin C)
- Inker LA, et al. NEJM 2021;385:1737-1749. (Combined equation update)
- NIDDK: eGFR creatinine-cystatin C equation details.
- NKF: eGFR cystatin C equations and usage notes.

## Cockcroft-Gault (CrCl)
- Cockcroft DW, Gault MH. Nephron. 1976;16(1):31-41.

## Corrected Calcium
- Endotext (NCBI Bookshelf): corrected calcium formula and limitations.

## Corrected Sodium (Hyperglycemia)
- Katz MA. NEJM. 1973;289:843-844. (1.6 mEq/L per 100 mg/dL)
- Hillier TA, et al. Am J Med. 1999;106:399-403. (2.4 mEq/L adjustment)

## Anion Gap
- Merck Manual: anion gap equation and interpretation basics.

## Winters Formula
- Merck Manual: Winters compensation formula and expected pCO2.

## A-a Gradient
- StatPearls (NCBI Bookshelf): alveolar gas equation and A-a gradient.

## Friedewald LDL
- Friedewald WT, Levy RI, Fredrickson DS. Clin Chem. 1972;18:499-502.
- StatPearls (NCBI Bookshelf): LDL calculation and limitations.

## BMI
- CDC: BMI formula and adult classification thresholds.
